parties: Dr. Gamage Rangana Sandakelum    Vs   Sri Lanka Medical Council and Others
keywords: Constitution of the Professional Conduct Committee under the Medical Disciplinary (Procedure) Regulations 1990,  whether the Sinhala version of the Regulations prevail over the English version,  procedural impropriety.
legistation: The Medical Ordinance No. 26 of 1927and the Constitution of the  Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka.
